name: Hanged Pig
description:
Hanged Pig is a classic hangman game of guessing words for friends and families.

This game is suitable for all ages and playable on mobile and tablet.

SINGLE PLAYER MODE
Guess a random word from a huge category of words (animals, celebrities, food, gadgets, logos, movies, sports).

2 PLAYER MODE
You will have to guess the word what your neighbor, friend, or partner typed in before by choosing the letters that you think may be included. If you give a wrong letter, your pig will be a bit closer to be hanged.

To win the game you will need to write the correct word before that the figure of the pig is completed.

FEATURES

- For all ages
- Free
- Simple Game Structure

CONTACT

If you have any suggestions for improvement or want to be informed about upcoming games that we are going to publish, follow us on our social networks.

@creacongames
